CREATE TABLE `Cooperation_TaskRule` (`strRuleCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strRuleName` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strRuleValue` VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL,`strRuleType` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`strRuleCode`))ENGINE = InnoDB;
